name: Alpha Sniper War
description:
Alpha Sniper War is one of bthe best non-stop action shooting game. You as an army superhero your duty is to bring back the world peace and kill all the global terrorists who have been destroying the peace of the world.
This is an ultimate sniper assassin endless shooter game to kill the terrorists. This modern sniper shooter game consists of bundle of missions in which you kill the terrorists from helicopter. In this you will get real shooting experience of sniper. The game consist of three realistic environments desert,forest and snow in which you find out the terrorist and kill all of them in limited time, complete the task and prove that you have the best sniper and shooting skills. Smooth and efficient controls,amazing sound effects and challenging shooting game. This modern new sniper 3d game is not only free game but it also an offline game. Now download and enjoy.
